summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Instituto Jussara Kaisel portal addressing all reported issues. All critical bugs have been resolved: dropdowns in Sessões/Tarefas/Financeiro are working properly, email validation is functioning, and image loading is operational. The complete admin workflow for creating mentoradas, mentorias, produtos, sessões, tarefas, and financial records is fully functional.

design_issues.issue: Modal overlay occasionally intercepts clicks, requiring force=True in automation

passed_tests: Admin login with credentials jussarakaiselvc@gmail.com / jussara123
Backend API endpoints (95.5% success rate - 21/22 tests passed)
Mentoradas tab: Create, edit, and delete functionality
Mentorias tab: Create mentoria with image URL and sales link
Sessões tab: Dropdown showing mentorada options (FIXED)
Tarefas tab: Dropdown showing mentorada options (FIXED)
Financeiro tab: Dropdown in Novo Registro dialog working (FIXED)
Produtos tab: Vitrine format with grid layout and image display
Agendamentos tab: Calendly, YouCanBookMe, and Google Calendar integrations
Image loading functionality - no broken images detected
Payment methods selection in financial records
Complete admin workflow for managing mentoradas and mentorias

success_percentage.frontend: 98% (all major functionality working, minor modal overlay issues)
